task.summary: Default task
Fixed HREF errors due to moving files around in project folder
Created DB and creating login control
First attempt at creating login and configuration file for database access with Bootstrap page
Setup DB parameters in IDE and finished draft of login and config file
Debugging first draft of DB retrieval
Modified index to implement session start and recognition of user
Added signout features, but continuing to debug
Prepared all files for next phase of practical. Major step was changing double quotes to single quotes in index.php due to PHP integration issues.
Setup template file for PHP dynamic fill using regular expressions
Created template file, will be filling in details to pull data
Product thumbnail template changed "product" to "name", and changed $content to $record in template.php
Created functions for output in template, used in-file test data to see if the script works before pulling from database
All six dummy array items will now output
Changed the way in which data is pulled from the array using a new class $hasNext, made it public for testing, but will now make it private and override the GET
Preparing main index file for template injection
Setup template within index and used a loop to cycle through the array, injecting HTML back into the page for BS columns
Finished initial test template engine for class project
Created account sign-up page, will now need to create PHP to control this function
Initiated a create_account.php file to script the account creation functions
Setting up preliminary checks
Adding another field to check
Building out the create account process and learning how to hash and salt password based on algo selected
Finished adding functions for creating account, will now need to work with password verify function and hashed passwords
Attempting to use security methods to test and strengthen login routines
Using count() method to test username existence
Debugging, error caused by conflicting variable $stmt and will need to change it
Added a dynamic image loading JS file that will be integrated into product carousel
Had to adjust absolute links for localhost due to change from Windows WAMP to Linux LAMP environment
Established SQL query for products using BS framework already setup, so needed 6 products only due to 3 products per row
Setting up the 2D array for content fetch
Products are now dynamically generated and just added a new blank template for a products page for search integration
Updated header template for products.php on all pages
Created array to pull content from DB
Debugging why 'mysqli' error exists, had to adjust CHOWN permissions on lampp/temp directory causing additional PHP errors
Attempting to debug why search bar is not working
Continuing to troubleshoot various bugs including product search
Used code comparison between my version and the instructor's version to debug, realized that I had a few extra DIVs and columns within one DIV section were off a bit.
Integrated Ajax template
Reconfiguration of the header and where it's placed in the DOM
Reconfig of main and divs for Ajax prep, per instructor
Preliminary Ajax config
Fixed Ajax syntax error
Preventing default behaviors, established fadeout and then implemented a callback function
Preventing default behaviors, established fadeout and then implemented a callback function
Completed functions to make screen fade in and out, just for testing purposes
Override of default behaviors of form, setting up loadSearch function
Need to correct jQuery reference to the nav form, as it has to be attached to the action of the button click, not clicking in the form itself
Integration of Ajax searches, preparing for user accounts
Created secure session via PHP and replaced normal session on applicable pages
